name: jetpack-boost
description: Boost your WordPress site's performance, from the creators of Jetpack

scripts.build-development: pnpm run clear-dist && pnpm run build-php && rollup -c
scripts.build-production: pnpm run clear-dist && pnpm run install-if-deps-outdated && pnpm run build-production-php && NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production rollup -c
scripts.build-production-php: rm -rf vendor/ && COMPOSER_MIRROR_PATH_REPOS=1 COMPOSER_ROOT_VERSION=dev-master composer install -o --no-dev --classmap-authoritative --prefer-dist
scripts.lint: pnpm run prettier && echo 'Running eslint...' && eslint app/assets/src/js && pnpm run validate -- --threshold warning && echo '✔ prettier, eslint and svelte validate ran successfully.'
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm run prettier:fix && echo 'Running eslint...' && eslint app/assets/src/js --fix && pnpm run validate -- --threshold warning && echo '✔ prettier fix, eslint fix and svelte validate ran successfully.'
scripts.test-e2e:start: npm --prefix tests/e2e run env-start && npm --prefix tests/e2e run tunnel-on
scripts.test-e2e:stop: npm --prefix tests/e2e run env-stop && npm --prefix tests/e2e run tunnel-off

author: Automattic
